snippet: The New York Racing Association dropped six scheduled live race days from its meet at Aqueduct, where six horses have fatally broken down on the inner turf track since December.
abstract: New York Racing Association drops six scheduled live race days from its Aqueduct meet address safety issues and preserve a horse population that has dwindled in light of more aggressive drug laws.
lead_paragraph: The New York Racing Association dropped six scheduled live race days from its meet at Aqueduct, where six horses have fatally broken down on the inner turf track since December.

headline.seo: Aqueduct Horse Racing Schedule Is Reduced by NYRA
headline.main: Safety Cited as Races Are Dropped at Aqueduct
headline.print_headline: Safety Cited As Races Cut At Aqueduct
